div.p:
—The number of telescopic
stars in the Milkey Way, is estimated at 18,-
000,000. In order, I will not say to realize the
greatness of this number, but, at any rate, to
compare it with something analogous, I will
call attention to the fact, that there are not in
the whole heavens more than about 8,000 stars
visible to the naked eye.—Humboldt.
